name: Apollo 11
description: First successful human landing on the Moon.

name: Apollo 13
description: A failed Moon mission that became a survival success story.

name: Voyager 1
description: Farthest human-made object, exploring interstellar space.

name: Voyager 2
description: Only spacecraft to visit Uranus and Neptune.

name: Curiosity Rover
description: Studying Mars climate and geology.

name: Perseverance Rover
description: Searching for signs of ancient life on Mars.

name: Spirit Rover
description: Explored Martian surface for over six years.

name: Opportunity Rover
description: Operated nearly 15 years on Mars.

name: Hubble Space Telescope
description: Revolutionized astronomy with deep-space imaging.

name: James Webb Space Telescope
description: Observing the earliest galaxies in the universe.

name: Cassini–Huygens
description: Studied Saturn and its moons in detail.

name: New Horizons
description: First mission to Pluto and the Kuiper Belt.

name: Juno
description: Studying Jupiter’s composition and gravity.

name: Mars Pathfinder
description: Delivered the first Mars rover, Sojourner.

name: Viking 1
description: First successful Mars landing mission.

name: Viking 2
description: Second successful Mars landing mission.

name: Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter
description: Mapping the Moon in high detail.

name: Artemis I
description: Uncrewed test flight for future Moon missions.

name: International Space Station
description: Permanent human presence in low Earth orbit.

name: Skylab
description: First U.S. space station.

name: Parker Solar Probe
description: Studying the Sun’s corona up close.

name: OSIRIS-REx
description: Returned samples from asteroid Bennu.

name: Kepler Space Telescope
description: Discovered thousands of exoplanets.

name: Chandra X-ray Observatory
description: Observing high-energy regions of the universe.

name: Galileo
description: Studied Jupiter and its moons.

name: Magellan
description: Mapped Venus using radar.

name: Hayabusa2
description: Returned samples from asteroid Ryugu.

name: Tianwen-1
description: China’s first Mars orbiter and rover mission.

name: Chang’e 4
description: First mission to land on the far side of the Moon.

name: Sputnik 1
description: First artificial satellite launched into orbit.
